text: Shaukat Tarin or Shaukat Tareen (born 1 January 1953) is a senior Pakistani banker.The Silkbank Pakistan, Annual Report for 2009 He was Pakistan's finance minister from 2009 to 2010.News report by Khaleeq Kiani, daily the Dawn, Karachi, Pakistan, 24 February 2010 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani businesspeople Category:People from Punjab (Pakistan)
title: Shaukat Tarin
